Title: Relates to locally administered utility taxes on mobile telecommunications service
Summary: Relates to locally administered utility taxes on mobile telecommunications service; allows local municipalities to tax mobile telecommunications service companies based on the mobile telecommunications customer's place of primary use within the territorial limits of that municipality.
LawCode: Amd ยง20-b, Gen City L; amd ยง5-530, Vil L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general city law and the village law, in relation to locally administered utility taxes on mobile telecommunications service
